newsitem.title: NORWAY: Norwegian bonds confused by U.S. data, end down.
newsitem.headline: Norwegian bonds confused by U.S. data, end down.

text.p: 1400 GMT -- Norwegian debt ended slightly off in a volatile afternoon amid confusion following the release of U.S. jobs data. Bond yields seesawed as traders tried to judge the data, which showed a strong payrolls gain but a mild wage increase. But the 10-year spread with Bunds remained flat from Thursday. Short rates continued down as the crown firmed. At 1531 GMT, the crown was at 4.029 against the mark versus 4.0375 late on Thursday.
* 2007 bond yield up 3 basis points at 5.89 pct
* Norway over Bunds gap unchanged at 22 points
* Three-month eurokrone down 3 bps at 3.56 pct
